MacNet Journal reports[1] that OmniOutliner will support OPML[2] soon. That's 
very good news[3] indeed.

[2] http://www.opml.org/
[3] http://www.omnigroup.com/mailman/archive/omnioutliner-users/2002-September/000402.html
